extension.news: [B][COLOR red]Update - v6.4.9 - Feb. 13, 2022[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Fixed rare AD resolve issue.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Caching mechanics has been changed to now account for shows that are still airing and refresh the data on a new episodes air date.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Using "Next" in OSD player controls, while in episode continual playback mode, would cause the keepAlive() instance to not terminate. This caused a number of unexpected results to resume points and marking of episode indicators.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Fixed issue where "Still Watching?" pop up would occur on first played episode in playlist if the episode was not the first listItem and it happen to match the number of episode for pop up to occur.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Increased PlayNext pop-up time to 300 seconds, 5 minute max.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Fixed PlayNext ticker timer count down. Previously it would not begin until the 60 seconds remained.[/I]
